mean_en: the particular method you use to achieve something; the art of moving soldiers and military equipment around during a battle or war in order to use them in the most effective way
sentence: The coach made different tactics before our football game.
sentence_trans: 教练在足球赛前制定了不同的战术。
word_etyma: tact接触 + ics名词后缀，学科 → 接触别人的学问 → 策略
